review: Dr Gupta is gem of a person and a thorough professional. Very humble, his compassion for patient sets him apart from his peers. He has an eye for details and smallest of issues doesn‚Äôt go unnoticed. His is very good in understanding patients‚Äô issues and explain the line of treatment to patients. May god bless him

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr ‚Äòs communication with patient is excellent and I am fully satisfied with the treatment.I am also impressed with his contributions towards Airtel‚Äôs Marathon (likely next month)despite his very busy schedule.Besides his views on the philosophy of life are really appreciable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: He is fantastic doctor, i consulted him during the peak of Covid second wave for some uncomfortable feeling and pain around my chest....he not only made me comfortable but also heard all my concern, gave me full time and assured me that I am perfectly fine! In times when people in Delhi were running from pillar to post for hospital beds Dr. Sameer gave me all the assurance that if I face any emergency, he is just a call away and I can seek his help in calling an abundance and getting a bed if god forbid I had required the same, his comforting words were enough to make me feel better! His international training and exposure is surely making a big difference for we delhites, thank a lot, Dr. Sameer.
Precise assessment and patient listening. Does not rush to conclusions. **** ******** *********. Not dismissive about other opinions.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,

review: Dr Sameer was very patient,calm,smiling and soft spoken. Went through each and every report page, we had brought. Our Extended loop recorder or Holter report was alone 27 pages plus ct, angiography,X-ray,echo and blood reports, 3 doctors prescriptions....12 plus medicines (taking twice daily 26 tablets)were changed to just 1 medicine, once daily single dose plus 1 medicine  on SOS basis.All in all, he goes above and beyond the call of duty for his patients. May he ever be blessed...
